title: Notion Steam API integration configuration schema
description: Validates configuration input for the Notion Steam API integration.

$schema.description: The JSON schema for this configuration file.

notionIntegrationKey.description: The secret integration key for your Notion integration. Find it on your integration dashboard after creating a new integration on https://www.notion.so/my-integrations

notionDatabaseId.description: The ID of the database you want to run the integration on. You can find the ID in the URL of your database, e.g. https://www.notion.so/myworkspace/your-database-id

resetLocalDatabase.description: If true, the local database will be reset and all data will be re-fetched from Notion. This is useful if you think the local database may be out of sync with Notion, e.g. if you deleted some games (which is not recorded in the local database).

forceRefresh.description: If true, the integration will reset the local database, fetch all Steam ID's from the Notion database and refresh all game properties. This may take longer, depending on the size of your Notion database.
